name: string-shot
effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.
